code: import{useState,useContext}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{AuthContext}from'./AuthContext';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Create=()=>{const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const[description,setDescription]=useState('');const[isPending,setIsPending]=useState(false);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const navigate=useNavigate();const{user}=useContext(AuthContext);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!user){setError("You must be logged in to create a messenger");return;}const messenger={title,description,creator:user.username};setIsPending(true);try{await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/messengers',messenger);console.log('New messenger added');setIsPending(false);navigate('/');}catch(err){setError(err.message);setIsPending(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"create",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Add a new messenger"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"error",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Messenger Title:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",required:true,value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Messenger Description:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{required:true,value:description,onChange:e=>setDescription(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Creator: ",user?user.username:'Not logged in']}),!isPending&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"Add Messenger"}),isPending&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{disabled:true,children:"Loading..."})]})]});};export default Create;
